## ProgramBuilder.buildComputeProgram() method

Creates a shader program for compute

**Signature:**

```typescript
buildComputeProgram(options: PBComputeOptions): GPUProgram;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | [PBComputeOptions](doc/markdown/./device.pbcomputeoptions.md) | The build options |

**Returns:**

[GPUProgram](doc/markdown/./device.gpuprogram.md)

The created program or null if build failed
